**SWTS Pte. Ltd. Singapore is Hiring**

**Position:**  
Field Service Engineer  
Engineering Services and Solutions Division

**Job Description:**  
As a Field Service Engineer, you will be responsible for installation, commissioning, maintenance, troubleshooting and servicing of power system equipment such as HT/LT switchboards, protection relays, and power transformers. He/She may also be required to attend the work related to AC/DC drives, UPS, battery chargers, and other ad-hoc duties when assigned.

**Main Responsibilities:**  
• Participate on-site service job as part of the service team or independently, working at local or remote locations.  
• Produce field service report and test reports for customers after completion of the job.  
• Maintenance and housekeeping work on test equipment when assigned.  
• Be punctual to attend site work.  
• Complete the assigned job scope on time where necessary.

**Requirement:**  
• Degree or a Diploma in Electrical or Electronic Engineering/ relevant Engineering discipline, or with years of relevant working experience.  
• Effective communication skills.  
• Able to attend oversea work when required.  
• Able to work well both as part of a team and on your own.  
• Eagerness to learn and work with a positive attitude.  
• Ability to carry out hands-on work and documentation in a timely manner.  
• Possessing a Class 3 Manual Singapore driving license will be an advantage.

**Benefits:**  
• Working hours: Monday – Friday, 8:15am – 5:30pm  
• Location: Jurong,  
• Monthly salary & Compensation for Overtime, Allowances (Handphone, oversea etc.) + AWS +Variable Bonus (Subject to company’s performance)  
• Medical and Group hospitalization and Surgical Insurance  
• Pick-up transport at designated location  
• Opportunities for training and development

Interested candidates are invited to send in their detailed resume to soyeong.yap@swts.com. You can visit SWTS’s website at http://www.swts.com. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
